content:
<rule id="applet-api-deprecation-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
            	    <javaclass references="java.applet.{*}"/>
                    <javaclass references="java.beans.AppletInitializer"/>
            	    <javaclass references="javax.swing.JApplet"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="The Java Applet API has been deprecated">
                    <message>
                        The Java Applet API has been deprecated and will be removed in future releases, since modern web browsers no longer support Java applets any references to it should be removed.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/398" title="JEP 398: Deprecate the Applet API for Removal"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
